name: Plasma (itch)
description:
A man surrounded in his dream by a creature name "Dream Killer".A creature surrounded in this man city.His mission is  to control his dream,support and destroy his client in about 10 days.You will be thrown in so many different places and discover different entites.

WASD to move

A game jam for Brackeys game jam

Made in 5 days

This game needs to be played in one sit.
